FuncDef:
The clock alarm-switch ais enable command enables the association of the clock source status on an E1 interface upon an AIS alarm.
The undo clock alarm-switch ais enable command disables the association of the clock source status on an E1 interface upon an AIS alarm.
By default, the association of the clock source status on an E1 interface upon an AIS alarm is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To prevent AIS alarms from affecting the restoration of the clock source frequency, run the clock alarm-switch ais enable command to enable the association of the clock source status on an E1 interface upon an AIS alarm.
